text: Men who do things without being told draw the most wages.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

text: People who know little are usually great talkers, while men who know much say little.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

text: Though force can protect in emergency, only justice, fairness, consideration and cooperation can finally lead men to the dawn of eternal peace.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

text: Bloody Christmas, here again, let us raise a loving cup, peace on earth, goodwill to men, and make them do the washing up.
author: Wendy Cope

text: I've only slept with men I've been married to. How many women can make that claim?
author: Elizabeth Taylor
